document_data.name: ''Rod of Reversal''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rods of reversal''''' were magic [[rod]]s that proved to be effective and highly sought-after items by spellcasters and those who hunted them.
document_data.Powers: Each rod held fifty charges and allowed its wielder to cast ''[[dispel magic ]]'' (three charges) and ''[[greater dispel magic]]'' (five charges). These wands were effective against friend and foe alike.
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], ''rods of reversal'' gained wide-spread popularity across the [[Sword Coast]]. These rods could be in stock of magic goods merchants in cities such as [[Neverwinter]] and [[Daggerford]]'s [[Sorceller's Encapsulate]].
